description:
Build a CLI tool that loads persisted agent state (InvestigateMemory, SolveMemory, etc.) from timestamped output folders and re-runs specific steps. Include options to override prompts, temperature, or tool calls for debugging.

**Rationale:** Currently, testing agent changes requires running full workflows from scratch, wasting time and LLM tokens. Replay capabilities would let developers quickly iterate on specific agent logic without re-executing expensive earlier steps.
title: Agent Execution Replay from Saved State
